title: Last year, Illinois started giving local news outlets tax credits to support journalism jobs. A new report looks at how it’s going
description: During a devastating week of news about news, you could easily have missed a new policy paper from the nonprofit Rebuild Local News. The report, released last Thursday, is a substantive, measured look at early stats and lessons learned from the first year of Illinois’ Local Journalism Sustainability Tax Incentive Program, which created the country’s...
